title: Retro LCD Wear Watchface
summary: Travel back to the 90s and get the old LCD Feeling to your wrist.
description: Travel back to the 90s and get the old LCD Feeling to your wrist.Many settings like ...★ custom layout adjustment (Text Position and Size)★ time format selectable (12 / 24H)★ date format selectabe (Day-Month / Month-Day) Month as number or short text★ Weekday★ Week number★ Watch Battery Level★★★★★ more Features are in progress!This digital watchface is compatible with Android Wear™watches!Added support for Android Wear 2.0, maybe not stable!!Please have a look under Companion App Watchface settingsInfotab Version when it ends with an .1 you have the Wear 2.0face installed.For Layout corrections please send me an screenshot of your the watchfacewith the selected Infotab VERSION thru E-Mail or G+.★Engineered in Germany★
descriptionHTML:
Travel back to the 90s and get the old LCD Feeling to your wrist.

Many settings like ...
★ custom layout adjustment (Text Position and Size)
★ time format selectable (12 / 24H)
★ date format selectabe (Day-Month / Month-Day) Month as number or short text
★ Weekday
★ Week number
★ Watch Battery Level

★★★★★ more Features are in progress!

This digital watchface is compatible with Android Wear™watches!

Added support for Android Wear 2.0, maybe not stable!!
Please have a look under Companion App Watchface settings
Infotab Version when it ends with an .1 you have the Wear 2.0
face installed.

For Layout corrections please send me an screenshot of your the watchface
with the selected Infotab VERSION thru E-Mail or G+.

★Engineered in Germany★
comments: Once you set the size and y and Z of the data it looks very good just takes 5 min to play about with. Would love a notification count for the perfect face
Looks perfect on my M600. If I may request, please make the Alarm and Chrono into buttons to activate those functions.
Can't find any customization options, losing some of the info into the black borders.
Way too hard to customize layout for your watch. Should come with preset watch sizes.
Like the concept but can't find the customize app. UPDATE: found the companion app. Great old school face.
I have the old LG g watch and I can say this is the best watch face I've tried in these years.
recentChanges: - 2.14.0 custom layout bugfix and Polar M600 layout
- 2.13.0 added option for custom layout adjustment
- 2.11.0 Asus Zenwatch 2 large size layout fix and code changes
- 2.00.0 change Date-/Timeformat and the Infotab, some layouts fixed
